desc: A global brand around cheap and affordable mobile insurance trusted by over 25 million policyholders. Offering the best life Insurance and daily hospital cash plan benefit with a competitive value for money insurance measured by benefit per peso. Buy insurance with your phone! No hassle. No papers. No agents.

layout.text: Lower price. Bigger benefits. Simpler plans.
Get life insurance benefits up to Php 540,000 for as low as Php 300 monthly! Cancel anytime.
